snippet.title: Mini Metro Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Build a better subway! Mini Metro, the videogame about designing subway networks, is launching out of Early Access on 6th of November 2015 on Steam, GOG, and Humble Store.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/287980/
http://www.gog.com/game/mini_metro
https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/minimetro_storefront
